en.name: Saurion
en.desc: Minimalistic C project using liburing and a threadpool to asynchronously manage sockets in high-concurrency environments.

es.name: Saurion
es.desc: Proyecto en C minimalista que utiliza liburing y un threadpool para manejar asincrónicamente sockets en entornos de alta concurrencia.

zh.name: Saurion
zh.desc: 使用liburing和线程池异步管理高并发环境中的套接字的简约C项目。
